bibl.title: Demarco v. McKay. Letter from Judge
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image.

org.orgName: United States District Court of Washington Territory, Second Judicial District

div1.p: Territory of Washington County of Pierce} SS In District Court

This matter coming on before me at Chambines in the city of Tacoma, W.T. on this 8th day of March 1887, upon the application of Frank Demarco, for a writ of Habeas Corpus Comading H.F. McKay, Chief of Police of said City of Tacoma, to him the body of said petitioner brought before the said petitioner brought before the said District Court, and there I show cause if any there be why said petitioner shall be longer restrained of his liberty, and it appears that sufficient cause exist and is shown why such writ should issue it is hereby ordered by the Judge of said Court that a writ of Habeas Corpus do issue forthwith out of said thiscourt commands said H.F. McKay to harm the body of said Petitioner, Frank Demarco before
